results.name: Townlock - Around the world in 80 puzzles - London

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel/AMD 2+ Cores (1.7GHz and above)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11
  • Storage: 650 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel/AMD 2+ Cores (1.7GHz and above)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
